org.usefultoys.slf4j.meter

Class MeterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usefultoys.slf4j.meter.MeterFactory

  • public class MeterFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The MeterFactory is a utility class producing Meters. The methods are shortcuts for calling the Meter constructor.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MeterFactory() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Meter getMeter(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
      Returns a Meter with given category equal to the class name, which will also be the logger name.
      static Meter getMeter(java.lang.Class<?> clazz, java.lang.String operationName)
      Returns a Meter with given category equal to the class name, which will also be the logger name.
      static Meter getMeter(org.slf4j.Logger logger)
      Returns a Meter with category equal to the logger name and as meter category.
      static Meter getMeter(org.slf4j.Logger logger, java.lang.String operationName)
      Returns a Meter with given category equal to the logger name.
      static Meter getMeter(java.lang.String category)
      Returns a Meter with given category, which will also be also the logger name.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getMeter

        public static Meter getMeter(java.lang.String category)
        Returns a Meter with given category, which will also be also the logger name.

        the Meter

      • getMeter

        public static Meter getMeter(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Returns a Meter with given category equal to the class name, which will also be the logger name.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class which name is used as category and logger name.
        Returns:
        the Meter

      • getMeter

        public static Meter getMeter(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                             java.lang.String operationName)
        Returns a Meter with given category equal to the class name, which will also be the logger name.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class which name is used as category and logger name.
        operationName - Additional identification to distinguish operations reported on the same logger.
        Returns:
        the Meter

      • getMeter

        public static Meter getMeter(org.slf4j.Logger logger,
                             java.lang.String operationName)
        Returns a Meter with given category equal to the logger name.
        Parameters:
        logger - The logger used to report messages and as meter category.
        operationName - Additional identification to distinguish operations reported on the same logger.
        Returns:
        the Meter
